label: 霊異記
対訳語: Miraculous Episodes of Good and Evil Karmas in the Nation of Japan
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: Nihonkoku genpō zen'aku ryōiki, composed by the priest Keikai of Yakushiji in Nara in about 787 (p. 77). [日本国現法善悪霊異記、景戒、薬師寺]
